title: Banned
body: Hey guys, ive been perma banned for going into my league client files, trying to locate league logs, after the last patch ive had an error when trying to open my league of legends client it has been letting me skip it and play anways so i didnt think much of it, but after yestdays patch it wont let me download in past the 2nd stage, so i went looking for the logs and must have misclicked something and now im perma banned for trying to change game files? surly you can check if any cheats/mods were used on the account this is also my first ever offense in 3 years of playing so can someone please explain what i have done wrong or if it was a automated system and ill get my account back?

replies.body:
Changing game files to gain an advantage is also punishable, just like scripting or mods. I don't know what you changed in the logs to give you an advantage, but it looks like it was bad.

You need to make a [**Riot** support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and see if they can explain a bit more. There are a few examples of file edit bans being [reversed](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/XhXwwb0f-permabanned-for-changing-gamecfg-even-though-riot-has-said-its-allowed?comment=0008), but it's not too common.

Hopefully this isn't a big issue and we can get you back on the rift soon :)

Ye hopfully, i think i deleted an english back?, because before the error turned to unspecified when i tried updating it said missing english pack, but it allowed me to skip it to do the download, than it crashed at the second part of the error than changed to unspecififed but i cant see why missing an english pack could get me banned for 1000years? especially when it was by accidant trying to find the logs i needed. ive got a ticket in hopfully support gets back to me soon
Rito plz, I only hax a lil' bit.

normally ban messages appear when you try to log in. did you get one? 
otherwise, you probably just need to repair your client i've changed game files and it happens once in a while 
patches reset any changes you've made unless you set a .json (or whatever file) to read only
if nothing works then reinstalling would be the best option
